review: This Switch charger from PWR+ is a solid choice for anyone needing a reliable replacement or backup charger for their Nintendo Switch. The build quality is impressive, with a sturdy and well-made design, and the 12-foot power cord is a great addition for added flexibility. It charges quickly and efficiently, supporting both TV and handheld modes without any issues. The only downside is that it’s a bit pricier than some alternatives, but the quality and reliability make it worth the investment. Overall, a very satisfying purchase that meets all my needs.
